nodes.text: Vamblades were dagger-length blades that fell between brass knuckles and swords. They extended from durasteel vambraces, which mounted the blade and provided a degree of protection to the wielder's forearms. The S-1 Vamblade constructed by Prax Arms was a type of vamblade that possessed a magnetic locking mechanism for retraction or extension of the blade.
Vamblades were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
